page.title: 07HARBOROUGH ROAD SHOPS
page.content: ALONG THE HARBOROUGH ROAD IS A THRIVING COMMERCIAL SECTION WITH MANY OF THE SHOPS NEWLY RENOVATED. THERE IS A WIDE VARIETY OF BUSINESS GIVING LOCAL RESIDENTS A VERY GOOD SERVICE.THE ROAD IS EXTREMELY BUSY WITH BOTH LOCAL AND THROUGH TRAFFIC.ACROSS THE ROAD AT THE JUNCTION WITH WELFORD RD.IS A NEWLY LAID OUT COMPLEX OF SHOPS AND CAR PARK MAKING A VERY CONVENIENT PLACE TO SHOP FOR THE WEEKS GROCERIES. BEHIND THIS DEVELOPMENT LIES THE END OF HIGH STREET WHERE THE VILLAGE ATMOSPHERE IS MAIN- TAINED ALTHOUGH THE NEW BUILDINGS IN THE CLOSE RATHER SPOIL THIS DESPITE THE FACT THAT THEY ARE NICE HOUSES IN THEM- SELVES. TO THE WEST OF HARBOROUGH ROAD LIES KINGSTHORPE RECREATION GROUND MUCH USED FOR SPORTING ACTIVITIES. A PRIVATE INDOOR BOWLING CLUB IS BEING BUILT IN THE S.E.CORNER BUT MANY RESIDENTS FEAR THE MEMBERSHIP FEES WILL BE TOO HIGH.
